price: Mu gihe mwogaragaza igikorwa ciza canke mukakigirira mu mpisho, canke mukagaragaza ikibi c’uwabagiriye nabi murondera kurenganurwa, canke mukamuharira nya kibi, ari na vyo vyiza cane, muramenya ko Imana Allah Yamye ari Nyenuguhariribicumuro, Mushoboravyose.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ خَيۡرًا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ أَوۡ تَعۡفُواْ عَن سُوٓءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوّٗا قَدِيرًا

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū khayran aw tukh'fūhu aw taʿfū ʿan sūin fa-inna al-laha kāna ʿafuwwan qadīran
